channel.title: NightMare |718| ECO| Perfect Bosses/Pking/Switches/Need Staff!
channel.description:
Forum - http://www.nightmarersps.smffy.com/index.php
[b][size=10pt]Videos[/size][/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0OiBm99it0A http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T32b-8V-1oo http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nAXYfH0bIHo
This server is by far the most joyous server you'll play. There is so much to go over on it and all i can say is[b]TRY IT[/b] [b]Dungeons:[/b] - God Wars - All slayer dungeons - Polypore - Jadinko - Revenants [b]Few main bosses:[/b] - Corporal beast - Jad - Queen Black Dragon - King Black Dragon - Balance Elementals - Tormented Demons - Nex - Penance Queen - Nomad - Glacors - Kalphite Queen
[b]All skills work perfectly[/b]
Perfect Prayers, Magics, Switching, PVM, Pking.
[b]Minigames:[/b] -Duel Arena -Clan Wars -Dominion Tower - Castle Wars -Dungeoneering -Crucible (custom)
[b]4 Available quests and more to come[/b] -Animal Magnetism -The Void Stares Back - Horror From The Deep - The Quiet Before The Storm
The server is constantly being updated daily for new things and we're working on releasing a spawn/pk server next month. We are in need of staff and players. All I can say is try it, because this is just the tip of the iceberg.

This server is by far the most joyous server you’ll play. There is so much to go over on it and all i can say isTRY IT
Dungeons:

  • God Wars
  • All slayer dungeons
  • Polypore
  • Jadinko
  • Revenants
    Few main bosses:
  • Corporal beast
  • Jad
  • Queen Black Dragon
  • King Black Dragon
  • Balance Elementals
  • Tormented Demons
  • Nex
  • Penance Queen
  • Nomad
  • Glacors
  • Kalphite Queen

All skills work perfectly

Perfect Prayers, Magics, Switching, PVM, Pking.

Minigames:
-Duel Arena
-Clan Wars
-Dominion Tower

  • Castle Wars
    -Dungeoneering
    -Crucible (custom)

4 Available quests and more to come
-Animal Magnetism
-The Void Stares Back

  • Horror From The Deep
  • The Quiet Before The Storm

The server is constantly being updated daily for new things and we’re working on releasing a spawn/pk server next month.
We are in need of staff and players.
All I can say is try it, because this is just the tip of the iceberg.
